entry.title: PostgreSQL Replication on Debian
entry.summary:
PostgreSQL is a powerful open-source relational database management system (RDBMS) that offers robust replication features. In this guide, we will set up master-slave replication on Debian, ensuring data is synchronized across servers for redundancy and high availability.

entry.title: DietPi Headless webmin Setup
entry.summary:
ğŸƒ What is DietPi?
DietPi is a lightweight and optimized Debian-based operating system specifically designed for single-board computers like Raspberry Pi, as well as other low-powered devices. It focuses on providing a minimal yet highly configurable environment for users who want performance and efficiency in their setups.
